summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Virginia Street from Minor Avenue to Westlake Avenue in the City of Seattle, by grading, regrading and constructing wooden curbs & gutters under Ordinance No. 15021, creating Local Improvement District No. 1361 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
